description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Bug Fixes
NETWORKNET-33601 - MailMessage.ValidateMessage not working
NETWORKNET-33618 - PST: ExtractMessage gives "No data is available for encoding 50000" error
NETWORKNET-33624 - EWS: Can not get the original Recepient address for Undelivered emails
NETWORKNET-33625 - Exception: Overflow Exception was Unhandled with large count of recipients
NETWORKNET-33626 - Inline image shown as attachment with "Paper Clip" icon in Outlook
NETWORKNET-33629 - Long Subjects in EML Lose Spaces due to line breaks when saved as MSG
NETWORKNET-33631 - Error arises if TO field is empty
NETWORKNET-33632 - Exception while message with empty FROM field printed to XPS
NETWORKNET-33634 - Exception: "Given document can't be processed" while printing MapiMessage to XPS file
NETWORKNET-33663 - iCal Description loses formatting when extracted using GetAppointmentText ()
NETWORKNET-33672 - "This is not a structured storage file" Exception raised while extracting messages from PST
NETWORKNET-33673 - Invalid data Error when loading eml
NETWORKNET-33613 - MSG file cannot be converted to EML using MailMessage.Save
 
Enhancements
NETWORKNET-33540 - Additional entries be added to ICS for exceptions in Recurrence by Aspose.Email
NETWORKNET-33540- Changing the time zone when converting emails to MHT
NETWORKNET-33606 - Create a draft appointment request
NETWORKNET-33619 - ImapClient: Provision of Filtering Messages based on Message's UniqueId
NETWORKNET-33621 - New overload of ImapClient.ListMessages with two arguments (MailQuery, int maxNumberOfMessages)
NETWORKNET-33665 - Identify and Extract embedded attachment (inline and icon) from MSG formatted as RTF
NETWORKNET-33611 - ImapClient.Connect takes long time to connect to this server
NETWORKNET-33612 - Read Receipt Behavior
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
